description: Sample email dataset for testing PhishGuard ML

emails.text: URGENT! Your PayPal account has been suspended due to suspicious activity. Click here to verify your identity immediately: http://bit.ly/verify-paypal
IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED: Your Wells Fargo account will be closed in 24 hours unless you verify your information. Click here now: http://secure-wellsfargo-verify.com
Congratulations! You've won $1,000,000 in our annual sweepstakes! Click to claim your prize immediately before it expires!
Your Amazon order #A12345 could not be processed. Update your payment information now or your Prime membership will be cancelled: http://amz-secure.net/update
FINAL NOTICE: The IRS has detected irregularities in your tax return. You must respond within 48 hours to avoid legal action. Call 555-0123 or click here.
Your Microsoft account has been accessed from an unusual location. Verify your identity immediately to prevent account closure: http://microsft-security.com
Apple ID Security Alert: Your account will be disabled unless you confirm your information. Click here within 24 hours: http://appleid-verify.net
Hi, this is the CEO. I need you to purchase $5000 in gift cards urgently for a client meeting. Please buy them now and send me the codes. Thanks.
FedEx Delivery Failed: We attempted to deliver your package but no one was home. Click here to reschedule or your package will be returned: http://fedx-delivery.com
Your password will expire in 24 hours. Click here to reset your company password now or you will lose access to all systems: http://password-reset-portal.com
Thank you for your Amazon order #123-4567890-1234567. Your package will arrive on Tuesday, October 24th. Track your shipment in your account.
Meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 2pm in conference room B. Agenda: Q4 planning review. Please confirm your attendance by replying to this email.
This week's tech newsletter: New Python 3.12 features, AI trends in 2025, and upcoming webinars. Read the full newsletter on our blog.
Your payment of $49.99 to XYZ Services has been processed successfully. Receipt #R-2025-1020-4567. You can view your invoice in your account dashboard.
Thank you for contacting customer support. Your ticket #CS-789012 has been created. Our team will respond within 24-48 business hours. Reference your ticket number for follow-up.

usage.description: Use this dataset to test the PhishGuard ML API
usage.example_python: import json; with open('sample_emails.json') as f: data = json.load(f)
